last_episode_to_air.name: Think of Three Things
last_episode_to_air.overview: The future of the United States is decided by six men in a room. Franklin and Temple face a changed world.

name: Franklin
overview: In December 1776, Benjamin Franklin is world-famous for his electrical experiments. But his passion and power are put to the test when he embarks on a secret mission to France—with the fate of American independence hanging in the balance.
tagline: Diplomacy is a game. America is the prize.

episodes.name: Sauce for Prayers
episodes.overview: As the fight for independence teeters on the brink of defeat, Benjamin Franklin and his grandson plunge into a world of intrigue and deception.

episodes.name: Welcome, Mischief
episodes.overview: An arms operation is threatened by a ruthless opponent. The Paris police watch Franklin's every move. Temple makes a confession.

episodes.name: Pride and Gout
episodes.overview: Bad news arrives from America. Franklin finds himself ensnared in the traps of Versailles. Temple bows down before a star.

episodes.name: Small Revenge
episodes.overview: Franklin pays back an insult—and receives the favor of a king. A new lover catches his eye, and an old rival turns up to thwart him.

episodes.name: The Natural State of Man
episodes.overview: Tensions mount between Franklin and Adams. Madame Brillon asserts her power. Temple decides to fight his own war.

episodes.name: Beauty and Folly
episodes.overview: Franklin suspects traitors are everywhere. Vergennes makes a final offer. Jacques introduces Temple to the thrill of the hunt.

episodes.name: Begin by Creeping
episodes.overview: After victory at Yorktown, the Americans and the French plot against each other for the upper hand. Franklin is laid low at a crucial moment.

episodes.name: Think of Three Things
episodes.overview: The future of the United States is decided by six men in a room. Franklin and Temple face a changed world.
